SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM dtb_order
LEFT JOIN mtb_fabric ON dtb_order.product_fabric_no = mtb_fabric.fabric_no AND dtb_order.order_pattern = mtb_fabric.order_pattern

FROM dtb_order
LEFT JOIN mtb_fabric ON dtb_order.product_fabric_no = mtb_fabric.fabric_no AND dtb_order.order_pattern = mtb_fabric.order_pattern
ORDER BY dtb_order.updated_at desc,dtb_order.order_id desc
